alert.note: Alert for Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Tuscaloosa County through 430 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over McFarland Mall, or near Tuscaloosa. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tuscaloosa, Holt, Coaling, Lake Wildwood, University Mall, McFarland Mall, Shelton State Community College, Englewood, Cottondale, Little Sandy, Camp Horne B.S.A., Maxwell, Taylorville, Hagler, Duncanville and Pearson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Birmingham.
